reviews.text: Really high quality and BEAUTIFUL sushi. The owner and sushi chef is so professional and good at what he does. Better than any other Japanese food I've tried in the valley. Friendly staff and delicious food!

Didnt particularly like the katsu. Too much meat, not enough rice or sauce. 

The ambience and service was nice though.

Arigato is my favorite sushi in Amherst. Seating is at tables for 2-4 people or the sushi bar. A couple of prized window seats allow diners to watch the people go by. 

The spicy tuna rolls, especially, are great. I've also tried a pickled vegetable roll, tuna roll, avocado roll, and veggie tempura roll. I recommend all these. My wife got the vegetarian bento box on our last visit. It was huge! And everything in there was delicious. Go to Arigato, I think you'll enjoy it.

Been here once and my experience was decent I must say. The curry dishes are good and worth a shot. The mango with sticky rice in the dessert section is amazing to be honest. The service was not the greatest though.
Taste- 4/5
Service- 2/5
Ambience- 3/5
Price- 3/5

We ate here 2 nights in a row. Ordered different sushi rolls each night. The quality, freshness and incredible flavor of each roll we had - AMAZING!!! I've traveled the U.S. & Canada and this small but quaint establishment should have nothing but a 5 star rating. The staff was friendly and courteous and the food was worth what we paid. I will eat here everytime i visit the Hadley/Amherst area!

Food was great! Service was not at this visit. Margarita was watery and the waitress said it was because she was new. Wasn't checked on by her till we were done eating has to ask other waiters for silverware, napkins and to fix the margaritas. Would eat here again but I'll stick with water.

We came here for a birthday dinner, we had a table of 9. It took about 15 minutes for our drinks and the iced tea tasted really weird. The waiter was not very attentive at all. We had to go up to the front counter to ask for silverware because our waiter was nowhere to be found. It took about an hour for him to take our order and took about an hour to get our food. By the time we got our food my plate and my sister in laws plate of food were ice cold. We were extremely disappointed because at the other locations the food and service are excellent.
Pretty good Mexican, decent service, sometimes forget details on orders. Good in house salsa. Authentic tamales.
Wonderful food. Great service. Reasonable prices. good location.

I love this restaurant for 3 reasons. The first is the cleanliness, the second is the staff, and last but certainly not least is the amazing food. Honestly I think the salsa is the main reason I go there. ♥️
